Dahalo Ethnic Militia (Madagascar)|Civilians (Madagascar)|Heavily armed and well organized groups of dahalo (operating mostly in rural areas of Madagascar) carried out violent attacks on Ilambohazo village in the extreme southeast region of Anosy. The attack left 6 people dead, all members of security forces (5 military personnel and 1 gendarme). In response the government mobilized 300 of the armed forces to the area to maintain peace. Another 7 agents were wounded and 4 are still missing.|UN Relief Web
